org.tagaprice.server.boot.dbinit
Interface IDbTestInitializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DbTestInitializer
public interface IDbTestInitializer

This interface is used to setup a databes and fill it with testdata It drops and re-creates the configured tables and fills it with data

Author:
haja

Method Summary
 void dropAndRecreate()
          Drops the tables and executes the scripts specified by the setters
 org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet fillTables()
          fill the tables with data from DbUnit
 void resetTables()
          removes the data added by fillTables() from the database.
 void setDbUnitData(org.springframework.core.io.Resource fillData)
          Sets the data to fill the database with using DbUnit.
 void setScriptsToExecute(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scriptsToExecuteResourcePaths)
           
 void setTablesToDrop(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tablesToDrop)
           
 

Method Detail

setTablesToDrop

void setTablesToDrop(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tablesToDrop)
Parameters:
tablesToDrop - the tables to drop when calling dropAndRecreate()

setScriptsToExecute

void setScriptsToExecute(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scriptsToExecuteResourcePaths)
Parameters:
scriptsToExecuteResourcePaths - the scripts to execute when calling dropAndRecreate(). These scripts must be specified as classpathLocation strings. These scripts typically consist of DDL to recreate the dropped tables.

setDbUnitData

void setDbUnitData(org.springframework.core.io.Resource fillData)
Sets the data to fill the database with using DbUnit.

Parameters:
fillDataResourcePath - The data to fill the database with when calling fillTables(). The data must be specified as classpathLocation string to DbUnit xml-file.

dropAndRecreate

void dropAndRecreate()
Drops the tables and executes the scripts specified by the setters

fillTables

org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet fillTables()
fill the tables with data from DbUnit

Returns:
the IDataSet that was parsed by DbUnit and inserted into the database.

resetTables

void resetTables()
removes the data added by fillTables() from the database.
